short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping you make the most of your Big Time assets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Tools to help you make the most of your Big Time assets

- When to pickup cracked hourglasses
- Understand the floor price of your ingame assets
- Should buy or craft hourglasses
- Should buy or refine premium currencies
- Custom countdowns so you know when your workshop is finished
- Calculator to make it easy to work with game currencies
- Crafting costs table
- Use voice to track what you pick up
